ui.panel.config.areas.picker.introductio: Areas are used to organize where devices are. This information will be used throughout Home Assistant to help you in organizing your interface, permissions, and integrations with other systems.

ui.panel.config.energy.grid.title: Električna mreža
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.sub: Configure the amount of energy that you consume from the grid and, if you produce energy, give back to the grid. This allows Home Assistant to track your whole home energy usage.
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.learn_more: More information on how to get started.
Grid consumption is the energy that flows from the energy grid to your home.
Pick a sensor which measures grid consumption in either of {unit}.
Select how Home Assistant should keep track of the costs of the consumed energy.
Use an entity tracking the total costs
Use an entity with current price
Grid production is the energy that flows from your solar panels to the grid.
Pick a sensor which measures grid production in either of {unit}.
Do you get money back when you return energy to the grid?
I do not get money back
Use an entity tracking the total received money
Use an entity with current rate
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.title: Solarni paneli
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.sub: Let Home Assistant monitor your solar panels and give you insight on their performance.

ui.panel.config.energy.solar.stat_return: Solar energy returned to the grid
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.stat_predic: Prediction of your solar energy production

ui.panel.config.energy.solar.dialog.enti: Pick a sensor which measures solar energy production in either of {unit}.
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.dialog.sola: Dodavanje informacija o prognozi solarne proizvodnje omogućiće vam da brzo vidite očekivanu proizvodnju za danas.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.title: Skladište kućne baterije
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.sub: Ako imate sistem baterije, možete ga konfigurisati tako da nadgleda koliko je energije uskladišteno i korišćeno iz baterije.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.learn_mor: Više informacija o tome kako da počnete.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.dialog.en: Pick sensors which measure energy going in to and out of the battery in either of {unit}.

ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.paragr: Potrošnja gasa je zapremina gasa koja teče ka vašem domu.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.entity: Pick a sensor which measures gas consumption in either of {unit}.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.note_p: Note: It is not possible to add both sensors measuring a volume of gas and sensors measuring the amount of energy contained in the gas.

ui.panel.config.voice_assistants.assista: Give your assistant a name and select your language. Depending on this language, you may be able to choose region specific variants below.
The conversation agent is the brains of your assistant and will process the incoming text commands.
When you are controlling your assistant with voice, the speech-to-text engine turns your voice command into text.
When you are controlling your assistant with voice, the text-to-speech engine turns the conversation text responses into audio.
If a device supports wake words, you can activate Assist by saying this word.
It looks like you don't have a wake word engine setup yet.
Find out more about wake words.
You should have an active cloud subscription to use cloud speech services.
Control all your Home Assistant devices via any Google Assistant-enabled or Alexa-enabled device.
Bring personality to your home by having it speak to you using our neural-network powered speech-to-text and text-to-speech services.

ui.panel.config.automation.caption: Automatizacije
ui.panel.config.automation.description: Kreirajte prilagođena pravila ponašanja za vaš dom
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.introd: Editor za automatizaciju omogućava vam da kreirate i uređujete automatizacije. Pratite link ispod da pročitate uputstva kako biste se uverili da ste pravilno konfigurisali Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.no_aut: Nismo mogli da nađemo nikakve automatizacije
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.only_e: Samo automatizacije u automations.yaml su izmenjive.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.dev_on: Samo automatizacijama kojima je dodeljen jedinstveni ID moguće je otkloniti greške.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.traces: Automatizacijama je potreban ID za praćenje istorije. Dodajte ID vašoj automatizaciji da bi bio dostupan u praćenju.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.no_cat: You can't assign an category to this automation
To assign an category to an automation it needs to have a unique ID.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.empty_: Automatizacije čine da Home Assistant automatski reaguje na stvari koje se dešavaju u vašem domu i oko njega.

Automatizacije povezuju okidače sa akcijama na način ''kada se okidač aktivira onda preduzmi akciju'' sa opcionalnim uslovima. Na primer: ''Kada sunce zađe i ako je {user} kod kuće, onda upali svetla''.
ui.panel.config.automation.dialog_new.cr: Počnite sa praznom automatizacijom od nule
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.read_o: Ova automatizacija ne može biti izmenjena iz korisničkog interfejsa, jer nije sačuvana u automations.yaml fajlu, ili nema ID.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.confir: Your are viewing a preview of the automation config, do you want to take control?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.missin: Nije moguće sačuvati automatizaciju bez imena
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.traces: Automatizacijama je potreban ID za praćenje istorije. Dodajte ID vašoj automatizaciji da bi bio dostupan u praćenju.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.load_e: Samo automatizacije u automations.yaml su izmenjive.
Samo automatizacije u automations.yaml mogu biti obrisane.
Do not start a new run. Issue a warning.
Start a new run after first stopping the previous run.
Start a new run after all previous runs complete.
Start a new, independent run in parallel with previous runs.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.trigge: Okidač je specifičan događaj koji se dešava u ili oko vašeg doma, na primer: ''Kada sunce zađe''. Bilo koji okidač naveden ovde pokrenuće vašu automatizaciju.
Nema podrške za vizuelni editor za platformu: {platform}
Kada neko uđe ili izađe iz zone, ili u određeno vreme.
Kada počinje ili se završava događaj u kalendaru.
Kada se nešto dogodi sa uređajem. Odličan način za početak.
Ograniči na događaje pokrenute od strane
Kada se događaj prima (događaj je napredni koncept u Home Assistant).
Kada se entitet kreiran od strane geolokacijske platforme pojavi u zoni ili nestane iz nje.
Kada se stanje entiteta (ili atributa) promeni.
Kada se Home Assistant pokrene ili isključi.
Kada se određena poruka primi na datoj MQTT temi.
Kada numerička vrednost stanja entiteta (ili vrednost atributa) pređe određeni prag.
Kada se trajna obaveštenja dodaju ili uklanjaju.
Ne bi trebalo da koristiš interpunkciju u svojoj rečenici
Da li si siguran da želiš da obrišeš ovu rečenicu?
Kada Assist pronađe rečenicu iz glasovnog asistenta.
Kada se oznaka skenira (oznake se obično kreiraju iz prateće aplikacije).
Kada se šablon proceni kao tačan.
Vrednost pomoćnika za datum/vreme ili senzora klase vremenske oznake
U određeno vreme, ili na određeni datum.
Tretirajte ovaj ID kao lozinku: držite ga u tajnosti i napravite ga da bude težak za pogađanje.
Kada Home Assistant primi veb zahtev na krajnju tačku webhook.
Kada neko (ili nešto) ulazi ili izlazi iz zone.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.condit: Ovaj spisak uslova mora biti ispunjen da bi automatizacija radila. Uslov može biti ispunjen ili ne u bilo kom trenutku, na primer: ''Ako je {user} kod kuće''. Možete koristiti gradivne blokove za kreiranje složenijih uslova.
Došlo je do greške tokom testiranja
Nema podrške za vizuelni uređivač za uslov: {condition}
Ako je entitet u specifičnom stanju.
Ako se neko nalazi u zoni ili ako je trenutno vreme pre ili posle određenog vremena.
Testiraj da li je više uslova ispunjeno.
Skup uslova koje pruža vaš uređaj. Odličan način za početak.
Testiraj da li uslov nije tačan.
Testiraj ako se 1 uslov ne podudara
Testiraj ako se nijedan od {count} uslova ne podudara
Ako je numerička vrednost stanja entiteta (ili vrednost atributa) iznad ili ispod određenog praga.
Testiraj da li je neki uslov tačan.
Testiraj da li se neki uslov podudara
Ako je entitet (ili atribut) u određenom stanju.
Ako je sunce iznad ili ispod horizonta.
Ako se šablon proceni kao tačan.
Proverite da li šablon prikazuje vrednost jednaku sa tačno
Vrednost pomoćnika za datum/vreme ili senzora klase vremenske oznake

Ako je automatizacija pokrenuta određenim okidačem.
Ako je neko (ili nešto) u zoni.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.action: Ova lista radnji će se izvršavati redom kada se automatizacija pokrene. Radnja obično kontroliše jednu od vaših oblasti, uređaja ili entiteta, na primer: 'Uključi svetla'. Možete koristiti gradivne blokove da kreirate složenije sekvence radnji.
Nema podrške za vizuelni uređivač za ovu radnju
This action can return a response, if you want to use the response, enter the name of a variable the response will be saved in
This action returns a response, enter the name of a variable the response will be saved in
Perform an action based on a template on {targets}
Perform an action based on a template
Sačekajte neko vreme da izvršite niz radnji.
Sačekajte da se šablon proceni kao tačan da biste izvršili niz radnji.
Wait for a template to evaluate to true
Čekajte na okidač da izvrši niz radnji.
Testirajte uslov (i zaustavite sekvencu ako uslov nije ispunjen).
Okini događaj ručno (događaj je napredni koncept u Home Assistant).
Uradi nešto na uređaju. Odličan način za početak.
Izaberite šta da radite na osnovu uslova (Slično kao If-Then, ali moćnije).
Conditionally execute an action and default to another action
Ime promenljive koje će se koristiti kao odgovor
Run a group of actions in sequence.

Postavi odgovor razgovora kada je automatizacija pokrenuta putem okidača za razgovor.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.re_ord: U režimu ste promene redosleda, možete ponovo da promeniti redosled radnji.
U režimu ste promene redosleda, možete da menjate redosled okidača, uslova i radnji.
U režimu ste promene redosleda, možete ponovo da promeniti redosled uslova.
U režimu ste promene redosleda, možete ponovo da promeniti redosled okidača.
ui.panel.config.automation.trace.path.ch: Izaberite korak sa leve strane za više informacija.
ui.panel.config.automation.trace.path.de: Podrazumevana radnja je izvršena jer se nijedna opcija nije poklopila.
ui.panel.config.automation.trace.path.no: Ovaj korak nije izvršen, pa stoga nema dostupnih dodatnih informacija za praćanje.
ui.panel.config.automation.trace.path.di: Ovaj korak je bio onemogućen i preskočen tokom izvršenja, tako da nema daljih informacija za praćanje.
ui.panel.config.automation.trace.path.no: Nije pronađena nijedna stavka evidencije za ovaj korak.
ui.panel.config.automation.trace.path.di: Ovaj čvor je bio onemogućen i preskočen tokom izvršenja, tako da nema daljih informacija za praćenje.

Zaustavljeno jer je dostignut maksimalan broj paralelnih pokretanja u {time} (vreme izvršenja: {executiontime} sekundi)

ui.panel.config.blueprint.add.override_d: Uvoz će prebrisati postojeći plan. Ako ažurirani plan nije kompatibilan, može pokvariti vaše automatizacije. Automatizacije će morati ručno da se prilagode.
ui.panel.config.script.caption: Scripts
ui.panel.config.script.picker.introducti: The script editor allows you to create and edit scripts. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured Home Assistant correctly.
ui.panel.config.script.picker.no_categor: You can't assign an category to this script
To assign an category to an script it needs to have a unique ID.
ui.panel.config.script.picker.empty_text: A script is a sequence of actions that can be run from a dashboard, an automation, or be triggered by voice. For example, a ''Wake-up routine''' script that gradually turns on the light in the bedroom and opens the blinds after a delay.
ui.panel.config.script.dialog_new.create: Start with an empty script from scratch
ui.panel.config.script.editor.id_already: You can't save this script because the ID is not unique, pick another ID or leave it blank to automatically generate one.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.introducti: Use scripts to run a sequence of actions.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.confirm_ta: Your are viewing a preview of the script config, do you want to take control?
ui.panel.config.script.editor.read_only: This script cannot be edited from the UI, because it is not stored in the ''scripts.yaml'' file.

ui.panel.config.script.editor.field.key_: The field key must not be empty.
The field key must not be the same value as another field.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.load_error: Only scripts inside scripts.yaml are editable.
Only scripts in scripts.yaml can be deleted.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.sequence_s: The sequence of actions of this script.
ui.panel.config.scene.caption: Scenes
ui.panel.config.scene.description: Capture device states and easily recall them later
ui.panel.config.scene.picker.introductio: The scene editor allows you to create and edit scenes. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured Home Assistant correctly.
ui.panel.config.scene.picker.only_editab: Only scenes defined in scenes.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.scene.picker.no_category: You can't assign an category to this scene
To assign an category to an scene it needs to have a unique ID.
ui.panel.config.scene.picker.empty_text: Scenes capture entities' states, so you can re-experience the same scene later on. For example, a ''Watching TV'' scene that dims the living room lights, sets a warm white color and turns on the TV.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.load_error_: Only scenes in scenes.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.name: Naziv
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.devices.int: Add the devices that you want to be included in your scene. Set all entities in each device to the state you want for this scene.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.entities.in: Individual entities can be added here.
ui.panel.config.cloud.description_featur: Control home when away and integrate with Alexa and Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.title: Cloud login
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.introduction: Home Assistant Cloud provides you with a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home. It also allows you to connect with cloud-only services: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of Home Assistant.
Home Assistant Cloud is a subscription service with a free one month trial. No payment information necessary.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.learn_more_l: Learn more about Home Assistant Cloud
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_passwo: You need to change your password before logging in.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_email_: You need to confirm your email before logging in.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.cloud_pipeli: Want to use Home Assistant Cloud for your voice assistant?
We created a new assistant for you, using the superior text-to-speech and speech-to-text engines from Home Assistant Cloud. Would you like to set this assistant as the preferred assistant?
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.in: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.ch: Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.title: Register Account
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.headline: Start your free trial
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: Create an account to start your free one month trial with Home Assistant Cloud. No payment information necessary.
The trial will give you access to all the benefits of Home Assistant Cloud, including:
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_r: Control of Home Assistant away from home
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_w: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of Home Assistant.
By registering an account you agree to the following terms and conditions.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.account_c: Account created! Check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.reset_data: This will reset all your cloud settings. This includes your remote connection, Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa integrations. This action cannot be undone.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.thank_you_: Thank you for being part of Home Assistant Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.sign_out_c: Želite li zaista da se odjavite?
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.integratio: Integrations for Home Assistant Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your Home Assistant instance publicly on the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tip_moved_: Looking for Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa settings? They are moved to the new voice assistants page.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.title: Text-to-speech
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.descri: Bring personality to your home by having it speak to you by using our text-to-speech services. You can use this in automations and scripts by using the {service} action.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.dialog: Hello {name}, you can play any text on any supported media player!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.info: Unesite ličnost svom domu tako što će vam on govoriti koristeći naše usluge teksta u govor. Ovo možete koristiti u automatizacijama i skriptama koristeći {service} uslugu.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.acc: Remote access is being prepared. We will notify you when it's ready.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.cer: Your certificate is loaded, waiting for validation.
There was an error generating the certificate, check your logs.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.inf: Home Assistant Cloud provides a secure remote access to your instance while away from home. For more information on remote access and these settings visit our security documentation.
Your instance will be available at your Nabu Casa URL.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.ext: Allow external activation of remote access
If you disable remote access on this page, having this setting enabled allows you to reactivate it remotely via your Nabu Casa account.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.dro: Remote log in has been deactivated
The below security options may make it appear the system is not running.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for Home Assistant Cloud you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.enab: Enable the Home Assistant skill for Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: If you enable state reporting, Home Assistant will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.manu: Editing which entities are exposed via the UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.not_: Da biste mogli da koristite Aleksu, potrebno je da aktivirate veštinu Home Assistant-a za Aleksu u Alexa aplikaciji.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.expo: Should new entities be exposed to Alexa automatically? Exposes supported devices that are not classified as security devices.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: With the Google Assistant integration for Home Assistant Cloud, you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.htt: Google uređaji neće moći da razgovaraju lokalno sa Home Assistant-om jer ste konfigurisali SSL sertifikat za vašu HTTP integraciju.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ena: Activate the Home Assistant Cloud skill for Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: If you enable state reporting, Home Assistant will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This speeds up voice commands and allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ent: Please enter a PIN to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors, and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this PIN when interacting with security devices via Google Assistant.
Enter a PIN to use security devices
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.man: Editing which entities are exposed via the UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.not: Before you can use Google Assistant, you need to activate the Home Assistant Cloud skill for Google Assistant in the Google Home app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.exp: Should new entities be exposed to Google Assistant automatically? Exposes supported devices that are not classified as security devices.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.i: Anything that is configured to be triggered by a webhook can be given a publicly accessible URL to allow you to send data back to Home Assistant from anywhere, without exposing your instance to the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.n: Looks like you have no webhooks yet. Get started by configuring a

ui.panel.config.entities.caption: Entities
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.introduc: Home Assistant keeps a registry of every entity it has ever seen that can be uniquely identified. Each of these entities will have an entity ID assigned which will be reserved for just this entity.
Use the entity registry to override the name, change the entity ID or remove the entry from Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.enable_s: This will make them available in Home Assistant again if they are now disabled.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.disable_: Disabled entities will not be added to Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.delete_s:
Are you sure you want to delete the entities?

Remove them from your dashboard and automations if they include these entities.

You can only delete {deletable} of the {selected} entities. The others require the integration to stop providing them, and sometimes a Home Assistant restart is needed. Are you sure you want to delete the deletable entities?

Remove them from your dashboard and automations if they include these entities.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.hide_sel: Hidden entities will not be shown on your dashboard. Their history is still tracked and you can still interact with them with actions.
Skriveni entiteti neće biti prikazani na kontrolnoj tabli. Njihova istorija se još uvek prati i još uvek možete da komunicirate sa njima sa uslugama.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.remove_s: Trebalo bi da ih uklonite iz konfiguracije vaše kontrolne table i automatizacija ako sadrže ove entitete.

ui.panel.config.zone.introduction: Zones allow you to specify certain regions on Earth. When a person is within a zone, the state will take the name from the zone. Zones can also be used as a trigger or condition inside automation setups.

OAuth is used to grant Home Assistant access to information on other websites without giving a passwords. This mechanism is used by companies such as Spotify, Google, Withings, Microsoft, and Twitter.

To change channel when the Thread radio has multiprotocol enabled, please use the hardware settings menu.
ui.panel.config.thread.change_channel_ra: Channel must be in the range 11 to 26
ui.panel.config.thread.change_channel_te: Initiating a channel change for your Home Assistant Thread network should be performed with caution. Some Thread devices may not migrate to the new channel automatically and, if the new channel is congested, your Thread devices may become intermittently unavailable. Some devices may need to be manually re-joined to your Thread network before they show in Home Assistant again. This action cannot be reversed (without performing another channel change).
ui.panel.config.zha.configuration_page.c: Zigbee and Thread share the same radio and must use the same channel. Change the channel of both networks by reconfiguring multiprotocol from the hardware menu.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.pair: Make sure your devices are in pairing mode. Check the instructions of your device or {documentation_link} on how to do this.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.disc: Devices will show up here once discovered.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.no_d: No devices were found, make sure they are in pairing mode and keep them awake while Home Assistant is searching.

ui.panel.config.zha.groups.create_group_: Enter the required details to create a new Zigbee group

ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.unbind: Unbind the selected group from the selected device clusters.
ui.panel.config.zha.neighbors.name: Name
ui.panel.config.zha.change_channel_dialo: Zigbee channel migration is an experimental feature and relies on devices on your network to support it. Device support for this feature varies and only a portion of your network may end up migrating! It may take up to an hour for changes to propagate to all devices.

Change your Zigbee channel only after you have eliminated all other sources of 2.4GHz interference by using a USB extension cable and moving your coordinator away from USB 3.0 devices and ports, SSDs, 2.4GHz WiFi networks on the same channel, motherboards, and so on.

It is recommended to use the "Smart" option once your environment is optimized as opposed to manually choosing a channel, as it picks the best channel for you after scanning all Zigbee channels. This does not configure ZHA to automatically change channels in the future, it only changes the channel a single time.
Devices will re-join the network over time. This may take a few minutes.

Number of messages successfully received by the controller

ui.panel.config.zwave_js.device_info.cus: This device is using a custom device config file not provided by Z-Wave JS. If you want to use the default device config provided by Z-Wave JS, you must remove the custom device config file from the folder that Z-Wave JS is reading from.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.hard_reset_cont: If you decide to move forward, you will reset your controller to factory settings. As a result, the controller will forget all devices it is paired with and all Z-Wave devices for this network will be removed from Home Assistant. If there are any devices still paired with the controller when it is reset, they will have to go through the exclusion process before they can be re-paired. Would you like to continue?
Your controller is being reset and restarted. Wait until the process is complete before closing this dialog
Your controller has been reset to factory settings and has been restarted! You can now close this dialog.
This action cannot be undone unless you have an NVM backup from your controller.

ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.exc: The device could not be removed. Please check the logs for more information.
Device {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_failed_n: Remove a failed device from your Z-Wave network. Use this if you are unable to exclude a device normally because it is broken.
The device removal is in progress.
Device {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
The device could not be removed from your Z-Wave network.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.reinterview_nod: Re-interview a device on your Z-Wave network. Use this feature if your device has missing or incorrect functionality.
You will need to wake battery powered devices before starting the re-interview. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
You can close this dialog and the interview will continue in the background.
The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.rebuild_network: Rebuild routes for your Z-Wave network

Start rebuilding routes on your Z-Wave network. Rebuilding routes will cause all devices to re-calculate their routes back to the controller and is recommended if you have recently moved devices or your controller.
The rebuilding process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the rebuild is in progress.
Rebuild of network routes is in progress. This will take some time.
You can close this dialog and the rebuild of network routes will continue in the background.
Route rebuilding failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
Rebuilding network routes has been cancelled.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.rebuild_node_ro: Rebuild routes for a Z-Wave device
Tell {device} to update its routes back to the controller. This can help with communication issues if you have recently moved the device or your controller.
The route rebuilding process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the rebuilding is in progress.
Additional information may be available in the logs.
A Z-Wave routes rebuild is already in progress. Please wait for it to finish before rebuilding routes for an individual device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.update_firmware: WARNING: Firmware updates can brick your device if you do not correctly follow the manufacturer's guidance. The Home Assistant and Z-Wave JS teams do not take any responsibility for any damages to your device as a result of the firmware update and will not be able to help you if you brick your device. Would you still like to continue?

WARNING: Firmware updates can brick your controller if you do not use the right firmware files, or if you attempt to stop the firmware update before it completes. The Home Assistant and Z-Wave JS teams do not take any responsibility for any damages to your controller as a result of the firmware update and will not be able to help you if you brick your controller. Would you still like to continue?
Select the firmware file you would like to use to update {device}.
Select the firmware file you would like to use to update {device}. Note that once you start a firmware update, you MUST wait for the update to complete.
Select the firmware target (0 for the Z-Wave chip, ≥1 for other chips if they exist) for this update.
The firmware update is ready to be sent to {device} but the device is asleep, wake the device to start the update.
If you close this dialog, the update will continue to be queued in the background and start automatically once the device wakes up.
The firmware update should start being sent to {device} shortly.
If you close this dialog, the update will continue in the background.
The firmware update on {device} is in progress ({progress}%).
Are you sure you want to abort the firmware update on {device}?
To attempt the firmware update again, select the new firmware file you would like to use.
The firmware update is complete! If you want to attempt another firmware update on this device, please wait until it gets re-interviewed.
The firmware update is complete! Your controller is being restarted and your network will temporarily be unavailable.

Perform a full re-interview of a Matter device. Use this feature only if your device has missing or incorrect functionality.
You will need to wake battery powered devices before starting the re-interview. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
You can close this dialog and the interview will continue in the background.
The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.matter.ping_node.title: Ping a Matter device
ui.panel.config.matter.ping_node.introdu: Perform a (server-side) ping on your Matter device on all its (known) IP-addresses.
ui.panel.config.matter.ping_node.battery: Note that especially for battery powered devices this can take a a while. You may need to up powered devices before starting the pinging to speed up the process. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
ui.panel.config.matter.ping_node.in_prog: The device is being pinged. This may take some time.
ui.panel.config.matter.ping_node.ping_fa: The device ping failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.matter.open_commissionin: Enable commissioning mode on the device to pair it to another Matter controller.
We're communicating with the device. This may take some time.
The command failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
Your device is ready to be added to another Matter platform.
With their app, scan the QR code or enter the sharing code below to finish set up.

ui.panel.config.analytics.description: Learn how to share data to improve Home Assistant
ui.panel.config.analytics.preferences.ba: This includes information about your system.
ui.panel.config.analytics.preferences.us: Details of what you use with Home Assistant
ui.panel.config.analytics.preferences.st: Counts containing total number of datapoints.
ui.panel.config.analytics.preferences.di: Share crash reports when unexpected errors occur.
ui.panel.config.analytics.need_base_enab: You need to enable basic analytics for this option to be available
ui.panel.config.analytics.intro: Share anonymized information from your installation to help make Home Assistant better and help us convince manufacturers to add local control and privacy-focused features.
ui.panel.config.network.caption: Network
ui.panel.config.network.supervisor.title: Configure network interfaces
ui.panel.config.network.supervisor.warni: If you are changing the Wi-Fi, IP or gateway addresses, you might lose the connection!
ui.panel.config.network.supervisor.unsav: You have unsaved changes, these will get lost if you change tabs, do you want to continue?
ui.panel.config.network.supervisor.hostn: The name your instance will have on your network
ui.panel.config.network.network_adapter_: Configure which network adapters integrations will use. Currently this setting only affects multicast traffic. A restart is required for these settings to apply.
ui.panel.config.storage.caption: Storage
ui.panel.config.storage.datadisk.title: Move data disk
ui.panel.config.storage.datadisk.descrip: You are currently using ''{current_path}'' as data disk. Moving the data disk will reboot your device and it's estimated to take {time} minutes. Your Home Assistant installation will not be accessible during this period. Do not disconnect the power during the move!
ui.panel.config.storage.datadisk.no_devi: There is no suitable external device found. The storage capacity of the external data disk must be larger than the storage capacity of the existing disk.
ui.panel.config.storage.datadisk.moving_: Rebooting and moving data disk. Please have patience.
ui.panel.config.storage.network_mounts.n: The operating system does not support network storage
Network storage is not supported on this host
To use network storage you need to run at least Home Assistant Operating System {version}
ui.panel.config.storage.network_mounts.o: Name
This name will be shown to you in the UI, and will also be the name of the folder created on your system
Remote share
This is the name of the share you created on your storage server
Server
This is the domain name (FQDN) or IP address of the storage server you want to connect to
Default backup location
This will be the default location for backups
Remote share path
This is the path of the remote share on your storage server
Protocol
This determines how to communicate with the storage server
Usage
This determines how the share is intended to be used
Samba/Windows (CIFS) version
This choses the version of the protocol to use
Username
This is your username for the samba share
Password
This is your password for the samba share
ui.panel.config.storage.network_mounts.e: Invalid name, can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores
ui.panel.config.storage.network_mounts.w: The selected CIFS version is not recommended to use, you should only use this if you have problems with auto and your server does not support version 2.1 or newer
ui.panel.config.system_health.caption: System health
ui.panel.config.system_health.descriptio: Status, metrics, and integration startup time
